metadata.name: Genesis N-VZBL #1 Purpish
metadata.description:
Token Owners will find Un-Lockable access info at https://genesisn-vzblcollector.orvylle.xyz/  
üöÄ It's token gated so you will have to sign in with the wallet address that holds your NFTüöÄ

N-VZBLS are Mixed Media works of art.  The profile is a 3D image created in VR, the background is acrylic painted canvas, and the two are combined to create a Portrait.  

The portraits in this genesis drop include a song titled ‚ÄúThis One‚Äù that is a soundtrack to the art, written and produced by Ingrid Woode, performed Live  by Ingrid Woode and the Woode Tribe Orchestra.  

Before an N-VZBL NFT is collected it is hidden from the public, but once collected they will then be able to be viewed by the rest of the world.  

 N-VZBLS is an ongoing portrait series of a particular profile image who represents the invisible ones. Those who have experienced not being heard or seen on many occasions in their life journey thus far.  Even those who shrunk into invisibility as a method to cope with the some of life‚Äôs experiences.   

Sometimes life‚Äôs greatest treasures are hidden or kept in some of the most obscure or unassuming places, experiences, and people.

Band/Engineer Credits  
Recording Engineers - Dave Davis, Bill Gwynne  
Mixing/Mastering Engineer - Robert 'Big Brizz' Brisbane  
Lead Vocals -Ingrid Woode  
Background Vocals (BGV) - Velrastine Shaw, Jessica Lynne Moon, Stephanie Ivory, Aliethia Evans, Staciea Braggs  
Bass - Kigwana Cherry  
Electric Guitar - Gary Langford  
Drums -Jonathan Mango  
Organ/Keys - Antoine Franklin  
Keys - Glenn Person
